reviewText: I'm not reviewing the content of the video, just the quality.  It looks like it was converted from a film strip, so sadly poor quality.  Luckily, you can see see the whole picture and hear the sound, but it just isn't DVD quality.
This a great DVD  that  kids love to watch and enjoy. The animations are beautiful  and the sound and lyrics are fantastic. Captures very well the essence of this great Hindu Mythology.
